name: Epic.Sentinel_Ninja_Mastery
display_help: A Ninja is a master of many tools and weapons, from the deadly Ninja Blade to deadly Tashibishi, in addition to various poisons.

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Ninja_Mastery.Caltrops
powers.display_help: You toss a handful of Caltrops at a targeted location and spread the tiny metal spikes over a large area. Any villains that pass over the Caltrops will be forced to move at a slower rate. They will also take some trivial Lethal damage over time. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Ninja_Mastery.Sting_of_the_Wasp
powers.display_help: You perform a standard attack with your Ninja Blade. This attack is slower than Gambler's Cut, but deals more lethal damage. Sting of the Wasp can reduce a target's Defense, making them easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 99.80% chance for -7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Ninja_Mastery.Paralizing_Dart
powers.display_help: Paralyzing Darts do minor toxic damage over time and incapacitate your foe. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Ninja_Mastery.The_Lotus_Drops
powers.display_help: You perform The Lotus Drops maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take moderate damage over time and reduces their Defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.name: Epic.Sentinel_Ninja_Mastery.Kemuridama
powers.display_help: You activate a kemuridama smoke bomb at your feet. The resulting flash of light and smoke can briefly distract your foes and Placate them so they can no longer find or target you. A mixture of toxins in the smoke also weaken your foes, reducing how much damage they inflict in addition to lowering their chance to hit. Recharge: Long
